column4: Hey guys, I have the million times asked question: How can I fix Compiz, on Lucid??
Compiz
desktop efects
What seems to be wrong with the effects?
Can you pastebin the output of 'compiz --replace' from your terminal?
compiz (core) - Fatal: glXCreateContext failed
There is your problem. You need to reinstall the nvidia driver
Which one should I install? I already tried 173 and 185, neither worked with compiz
Ah, you may need to blacklist the nouveau kernel module
Did you google how to install the proprietary driver on 10.04?
I installed through Jockey, and also tried nVidia.com binary installation
so that's a 'no' to googling then?
that's a no, sorry
already have blacklist nuveau
Pastebin your X log then
And see if 'lsmod|grep nouveau' has any output
thanks, I'm gonna give google a try. "pastebin"??
pastebin service like pastebin.com or .org
aah, got it. Ok, thanks
google can also tell you what pastebin is ;)
Compiz working, google teached me I need to blacklist some other stuff to properly install propietary nVidia driver :P
Thanks for your help
cool, np ;)
